name: Catilisious
description:
Catilisious - Demo v.1

It was a beautiful day in the neighbourhood until the cat woke up...

You play as a cat whose aim is to bring bad luck to the people in the neighbourhood. You have a set of tasks to complete to reach true evilness!

Developed by First Crown Team.

Bertaç Severcan

F. Eren Dalçık

We hope you enjoy our demo!

Assets are from Polyperfect.
